function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Change in work schedules due to curfew restrictions","Impact":"Disruption of regular work routines and potential strain on nursing staff","Mitigation":"Flexible work arrangements, support services for nursing staff, and mental health resources","Technologies":"Workforce management software, communication platforms, and remote work tools","People":"Nursing staff, healthcare providers, and patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government agencies, and nursing managers"},{"Description":"Increased working hours and vacation time for nurses","Impact":"Potential fatigue, burnout, and reduced quality of patient care","Mitigation":"Regular breaks, support services, and workload management","Technologies":"Scheduling software, fatigue monitoring tools, and telemedicine platforms","People":"Nursing staff, healthcare providers, and patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, nursing managers, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Exchange of nurses to address shortages","Impact":"Disruption of personal and family lives of nurses, potential emotional and psychological impact","Mitigation":"Counseling services, support for affected nurses, and clear communication","Technologies":"Communication platforms, teleconferencing tools, and mental health resources","People":"Nursing staff, healthcare providers, and families of nurses","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, nursing managers, and government agencies"}]}
